name: Bunswater College
description: For over 70 years, Bunswater has inspired global explorers through high-quality international education. The merger of Eurocentres and Bunswater marks a new chapter in the sector, combining decades of experience to form a leading force in global learning. Bunswater Education is dedicated to building vibrant communities of international thinkers and adventurers from all backgrounds. The organisation was founded with the vision of encouraging learners to discover new cultures, explore diverse perspectives, and embrace the spirit of global citizenship. With modern, well-equipped classrooms and a network of international centres, Bunswater offers more than just language education. Its programmes are designed to equip students with valuable vocational skills, foster life-changing experiences, and promote a mindset of giving back to communities worldwide. Bunswater continues to support and inspire learners across the globe, offering education that goes beyond the classroom and into the heart of global culture.

courses.name: General English
courses.description: The General English course at Bunswater uses market-leading materials to deliver engaging, interactive lessons. Teachers combine a variety of methods to build practical communication skills through relevant, real-life themes. In addition to speaking, students develop reading, writing, and listening skills. Each lesson includes a dynamic mix of grammar, vocabulary, and communication activities, designed to keep learners motivated and prepared for everyday situations in a connected, global world.
other_details: Required to purchase a course book

courses.name: Exam Preperation
courses.description: Bunswater’s exam preparation courses are designed for students from Intermediate to Proficiency level (CEFRL B1 to C2), offering focused training for Academic IELTS, FCE, CAE, and CPE exams. Lessons combine exam strategies with language development to boost confidence and performance. Progress is tracked through weekly reviews, revision weeks, mock exams, and tutorials. A course book is required. IELTS scores typically range from 6.5 to 9.0, depending on individual progress and study commitment.
other_details: Suitable for at least IELTS 5.5-6.0, CEFRL C1, or equivalent

courses.name: Intensive Exam Preperation
courses.description: Bunswater’s exam preparation courses are designed for students from Intermediate to Proficiency level (CEFRL B1 to C2), offering focused training for Academic IELTS, FCE, CAE, and CPE exams. Lessons combine exam strategies with language development to boost confidence and performance. Progress is tracked through weekly reviews, revision weeks, mock exams, and tutorials. A course book is required. IELTS scores typically range from 6.5 to 9.0, depending on individual progress and study commitment.
other_details: Suitable for at least Level 4 Bunswater, CEFRL B1, or equivalent

courses.name: Cambridge Exam Preperation
other_details: Suitable for at least First (FCE) min. B2 (Level 6), Advanced (CAE) min. C1 (Level 8)
Can be combined with 5 or 10 General English lessons

accommodation.name: Stay with family
accommodation.description:
All new homestay families are personally met by the team of the college, and accommodation is inspected in advance to ensure it meets quality standards. After booking, your coordinating manager will contact you to provide available options and help arrange a suitable match with a local host family.
 Twin rooms are only available for two people traveling together
Students in a single room may be housed in the same homestay as other students
Students under 18 in a homestay must book at least Half Board, a return transfer and provide a parental consent form
Extra nights: billed on a pro-rata basis
16+

accommodation.name: Student house
accommodation.description:
Student house accommodation offers a more independent living experience, ideal for students aged 18 and above. All properties are inspected to ensure they meet safety and comfort standards. After booking, a coordinating manager will share available options and assist in placing students in a suitable residence.
En-suite: Shared kitchen and communal living spaces, toilet and shower or bath can be accessed from within your room
Age 18+
Studio: En suite bathroom, with kitchenette
Self-catering only
Arrival and Departure day: Sunday to Saturday
